items.description: Satisfy your craving for something delicious with fire-grilled chicken, fresh avocado, pinto beans, pico de gallo salsa, fresh cilantro, melted jack cheese and creamy cilantro dressing wrapped in a grilled tortilla.
items.title: Chicken Avocado Burrito

items.description: Dont miss out on chicken breast fire-grilled to perfection then chopped and joined with a mouthwatering combination of pinto beans, rice, diced onions, fresh cilantro and pico de gallo salsa
items.title: Original Pollo Bowl

items.description: Double up on a double portion of delicious citrus-marinated chopped chicken breast on top of authentic pinto beans, rice, cabbage and garnished with sour cream, shredded jack cheese, avocado slices and pico de gallo salsa.
items.title: Ultimate Double Chicken Bowl

items.description: Deeply marinated fire-grilled chicken, crisp shredded lettuce blend and authentic corn, pico de gallo salsa, Cotija cheese, corn tortilla strips and fresh cilantro make being a salad look good. Served with creamy cilantro dressing.
items.title: Grilled Chicken Salad

items.description: f you're a bacon lover, you'll go crazy over our Avocado Bacon Tostada Salad. Nested in a crisp flour tostada shell, it's filled with chopped romaine lettuce blend, pinto beans, rice, our famous fire-grilled chicken breast, pico de gallo salsa and finished with fresh avocado slices and crisp, delicious and satisfying bacon, of course.
items.title: Avocado Bacon Chicken Tostada Salad

items.description: Dusted in cinnamon sugar and served warm, our churros are perfectly fresh, crispy and delicious.
items.title: Churros (2)

items.description: Get on the lunch honor roll with rice, pinto beans and shredded jack cheese rolled up in a flour tortilla with your choice of a small classic side

items.description: *** Serves 6-8 *** 4 burritos cut in half plus fresh salsa. Your choice of The Poblano (chicken, avocado, rice, pinto beans, flame-grilled corn, cilantro, diced onions, melted Jack cheese and a mild salsa prepared with Poblano chilies, or The Spicy Chipotle (chicken, rice, pinto beans, pico de gallo, sour cream, cilantro, melted Jack cheese and a spicy, smoky fire-roasted Chipotle salsa.
items.title: Cater. Burrito Platter
